job_title: Anonymous Employee in Old Bridge, NJ
pros: Loved my co workers became like a family..  Most people know each other throughout facilities.  decent patient volume, and beautiful new outpatient facility. Benefits are good too!
cons: short staffed at times for the amount of work, may have to go between facilities, which aren't run the same. Mandated to participate in a wellness program every year to determine benefits contribution.

review_title: Very good staff, however, highly understaffed in Old Bridge Division. Needs more financial resources
job_title: RN Staff Nurse in Old Bridge, NJ
pros: Willing to hire new graduates. Has attained Magnet status. Maintains accountability and professionalism.
cons: Very low wages, non-union, no pension, lacks reputable retirement and benefit package, high employee turnover, understaffed, neglects Old Bridge Facility in terms of committed resources, does not have enough nurses with deep experience to mentor young nurses or provide solid training.

review_title: If it wasn't for the low pay it would be a great place to work
job_title: Unit Assistant in Old Bridge, NJ
pros: The family like feel, how everyone comes together and willing to help. Management is easy to talk to if your having an issue or problem on the unit.
cons: The pay and unorganization at times. Most times we are only told what we didn't do or what can be improved but not really rewarded or shown appreciation for all we do

job_title: CT Technologist in Sewaren, NJ
pros: The hospital staff strive to work together more for the benefit of the patients

job_title: Registered Nurse in Sayreville, NJ
pros: Coworkers fun to work with... Patients are very thankful. Location to my house was amazing. Only a 15 minute commute. The staff is friendly too. Very professional. The meridian merger definitely made it a diverse environment
cons: Not enough hours . Location is dangerous at night always walk with someone or have security escort you. The upper management could be more friendly

job_title: Registered Nurse in Old Bridge, NJ
pros: Great work life balance and friendly atmosphere. It is a small community hospital where everyone knows each other.
cons: It is one of the lower paying hospitals in the area. there are 8 hour shifts and 12 hour shift so continuity of care can sometimes be difficult.

job_title: Patient Care Tech in Old Bridge, NJ
